name: Forest Fall Frenzy
description:
Forest Fall Frenzy is a game in which the player controls a tree defending its patch from deforesters who are making their way around the forest to slay the tree's kin.

Tutorial - Press play on the main menu - WASD to Move the Camera and mouse/trackpad for moving around and clicking to attack deforesters. - Abilities can be selected by clicking them or pressing the apparent number.

This game was created for Abertay Global Game Jam 2023 with a team of seven people in 48 hours.

Jam Site:  Abertay University 2023

Platforms: 

MS Windows, Web standard (HTML5, Java, JavaScript, Flash)

Tools And Technologies: 

GitHub, Unity

Technology Notes: 

- Maya
- Blender
- Clipstudio
- Procreate
- Visual Studio

Credits: 

- Gordon Bicker
- Katya Dix
- Riley McNeil
- Alena Barr
- James McDade
- Ethan Nicholson
- Jake Bretherton
